TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AsyncEnumerableExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for to enable advanced streaming operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<TSource>> ChunkByKey<TSource,TKey> (this System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource,TKey> keySelector, System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer<TKey>? comparer = default, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1<!!TSource>> ChunkByKey<TSource, TKey>(class System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source, class System.Func`2<!!TSource, !!TKey> keySelector, class System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1<!!TKey> comparer, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function ChunkByKey(Of TSource, TKey) (source As IAsyncEnumerable(Of TSource), keySelector As Func(Of TSource, TKey), Optional comparer As IEqualityComparer(Of TKey) = Nothing, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As IAsyncEnumerable(Of IAsyncEnumerable(Of TSource))

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements in the source sequence.
The type of the key used for grouping.
Docs.param: A function to extract the key from each element.
An equality comparer to compare keys. If null, uses the default equality comparer.
A cancellation token to observe while enumerating the sequence.
Docs.summary: Chunks the async enumerable sequence into groups based on a key selector function.
Docs.returns: An async enumerable of async enumerable chunks, where each chunk contains consecutive elements with the same key.

<Extension()> Public Function ChunkOnChange(Of TSource) (source As IAsyncEnumerable(Of TSource), Optional isChanged As Func(Of TSource, TSource, Boolean) = Nothing, Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As IAsyncEnumerable(Of IAsyncEnumerable(Of TSource))

static member ChunkOnChange : System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<'Source> * Func<'Source, 'Source, bool> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.IAsyncEnumerable<'Source>>

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements in the source sequence.
Docs.param: A function to determine if an element has changed from the previous one. If null, uses default equality comparison.
A cancellation token to observe while enumerating the sequence.
Docs.summary: Chunks the async enumerable sequence into groups based on when consecutive elements change.
Docs.returns: An async enumerable of async enumerable chunks, where each chunk contains consecutive elements that are considered equal.

<Extension()> Public Function Peek(Of T) (source As IAsyncEnumerable(Of T), Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As ValueTask(Of ValueTuple(Of Boolean, T, IAsyncEnumerable(Of T)))

Docs.typeparam: The type of elements in the sequence.
Docs.param: A cancellation token to observe while peeking at the sequence.
Docs.summary: Peeks at the first element of an async enumerable sequence without consuming the sequence.
Docs.returns: A tuple containing a flag indicating if the sequence has a value, the first element, and the complete sequence including the peeked element.
